attributes.action: reinstate Professor Nutt and to follow the advise of the government's advisory council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Home Secretary recently asked Professor David Nutt to resign because of he has talked about the way evidence has been repeatedly ignored by the current government with regard to drug policy.  We call for him to be reinstated and for the government to follow the guidance that its advisory council gives it, who have far more expertise, knowledge, and evidence than ministers on this issue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
